app.title: Safe / Blind Zones — Live Tester
description.short: In short: 10% top, 12% bottom, 5% left/right are the “blind zones”. Keep all actionable UI and text inside the safe zone, and add an extra 2–3% margin inside the safe zone.
form.marginTopBottomHint: Extra padding inside the safe zone. Recommended 2–3% of the screen height.
form.marginSidesHint: Extra padding inside the safe zone. Recommended 2–3% of the screen width.

note.general: The rule is universal: blind-zone percentages stay the same across artboards; convert minimum tap sizes to pixels via dpi (Android) or scale (iOS). A 2–3% inner padding keeps key content safe across aspect ratios.
